exportDescription: Copy the HMAC-protected library below to back up or share your creatures. Paste it into the Import Library dialog on any device to restore.
importDescription: Paste a library export string to merge categories and creatures into your library. Existing records with matching IDs will be overwritten.
importPlaceholder: Paste your exported library string here...
noCategoriesForFilter: No categories yet. Add one to organize creatures.
noCategoriesInForm: No categories yet. Create one first.
noCategoriesYet: No categories yet. Create one to organize creatures.
noCreaturesSelected: No creatures selected. Return to the library to choose creatures.
noCreaturesYet: No creatures yet. Create one to get started.
